text: E kamagh mɨkɨman kogh, uari tuisɨgh suam, e gumazir uarira uan ziaba feba ko, e vɨrara ghue. Egh e kamaghɨn mɨkɨman kogham, en araziba men araziba ko magh ghu. Puvatɨ, gumazir kaba uari uan araziba tuisɨsi. Egha gumazir mam uan arazim igharazitavɨn arazim koma a tuisɨsi. Gumazir kamaghɨn amiba, me fofozir aghuiba bar puvatɨ.
